infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow users to send photos for processing orders. Your photos wont be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to allow users to send orders via voice message.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow users to send photos for processing orders. Your photos wont be shared without your permission
